body.name: CariFree Maintenance Rinse (Grape): Fluoride Mouthwash | Dentist Recommended Anti-Cavity Oral Care | Xylitol | Neutralizes pH | Freshen Breath | Cavity Prevention | Alcohol Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 33 mins
features: [LONG-TERM PREVENTION AND MAINTENANCE]: Do you ever wonder why some of us continue to get cavities despite meticulous oral hygiene, whereas others who rarely brush and floss do not? The risk of cavities varies from person to person and is based on eating and drinking habits, hygiene (brushing and flossing), saliva flow, as well as other factors. *NEW LOOK, same great formula! Formally known as CariFree CTx3 Rinse*

[PROTECT YOUR SMILE]: CariFree Maintenance Rinse contains 0.05% sodium fluoride, which helps prevent tooth decay and white spots. Evidence shows that fluoride strengthens your teeth and aids in the prevention of dental cavities.

[NEUTRALIZE pH] Studies suggest that tooth decay is a function of low pH. Maintaining an elevated or neutral pH balance helps to keep your tooth enamel and smile healthy. CariFree Maintenance Rinse is alcohol-free and contains patented pH+ technology to elevate the pH in your mouth, keeping it balanced. U.S. Patent No. 9,427,384 & 10,143,6

[FORMULATED WITH XYLITOL]: Maintenance Rinse contains 25% xylitol! Xylitol is a naturally occurring, sweet-tasting ingredient found in many types of plants. Research shows that regular use of xylitol-rich products may reduce your risk of dental cavities.

[DENTIST-RECOMMENDED MOUTHWASH] Maintaining proper dental hygiene and cavity prevention is essential to a happy and healthy smile! The dentist recommended Maintenance Rinse fluoride mouthwash actively works to prevent cavities, freshen breath, and elevate pH.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What Makes Us Different? Do you ever wonder why some people continue to get cavities despite meticulous oral hygiene, whereas others who rarely brush and floss do not? Can a person really be cavity-prone? An imbalance in your mouth causes cavities, and when dentists drill and fill cavities, they are only treating the result, not the imbalance itself—and the decay returns. For many, it's a frustrating, reactive approach to oral health, but not surprising. Until recently, dentists were taught that you'd be free of decay if you have good oral hygiene. The problem is that it's just not that simple. Break the cycle of decay with CariFree. CariFree's pH-elevated products fix the problem at its source. Safe to use every day, our non-abrasive products are highly effective and scientifically proven to prevent cavities. Maintenance Rinse is one of CariFree's most popular products due to the great taste and fresh feeling after use. This scientifically proven formula contains cavity-fighting fluoride, xylitol, and an elevated pH. Maintenance Rinse is non-staining, alcohol-free, and is recommended by dentists for use twice daily and for ages 6+. For best results, we suggest pairing the Maintenance Rinse and the Carifree Gel 1100 - rinsing first and brushing second so that the nanohydroxyapatite in the CariFree Gel 1100 remains on the teeth for additional protection.

Perfect For Patients with decay or high risk of decay Low/poor saliva Bad breath (halitosis) Acidic diet Medication induced xerostomia Product Benefits Long-term cavity prevention Elevated pH Maintain a healthy smile Alcohol-free Non-staining 3 grams of xylitol per dose Available in mint, citrus, and grape! Why CariFree? Break the cycle of decay with CariFree. CariFree's pH elevated products fix your decay problem at its source. Safe to use every day, our non-abrasive products are highly effective and scientifically proven to prevent cavities through remineralization.

CariFree Maintenance Rinse, Grape Active Ingredients: Sodium Fluoride 0.05% Inactive Ingredients: Inactive Ingredients: Artificial Flavors, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Water, Xylitol Protective Ingredients Xylitol - Xylitol in the CTx3 Rinse is a naturally occurring, sweet-tasting ingredient found in many types of plants. Research shows that regular use of xylitol-rich products may reduce your risk of dental cavities. Protective Ingredients Elevated pH - Maintaining an elevated or neutral pH balance helps to keep your tooth enamel and smile healthy. Protective Ingredients Fluoride - Fluoride strengthens the teeth while also making them less susceptible to demineralization. Maintenance Rinse (Grape) Xylitol Elevated pH Fluoride

How To We recommend using the Maintenance Rinse along with the CariFree Gel 1100. For best results rinse first, brush second and wait 30 minutes before eating or drinking. Use twice daily Swish for 60 seconds with 10 mL CTx4 Gel 1100 replaces your current toothpaste Brush twice daily with a pea-sized amount

Try All Three Flavors! CariFree Maintenance Rinse comes in three delicious flavors! New look same great product! Previously called CTx3 Rinse A daily rinse intended to help maintain long-term oral health by providing anti-cavity benefits, including fluoride and pH neutralization. Recommended for ages 6+. 16 fl oz bottle (approximately 48 doses per bottle)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for your teeth
reviews.reviewText: As a Dentist this is my recommended mouth rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended by my dentist
reviews.reviewText: I tried this rinse because my dentist recommended it. I prefer the mint over the grape. The mint is NOT overpowering, btw. I used several bottles of Carifree. I didn't notice any difference. It there was there wasn't anything significate enough for me to rationalize the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for extra care of your teeth. I could tell the difference in one use. I have been using this product for a year or more now and plan on continuing to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: this is very easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no cavities last time!
reviews.reviewText: liked grape flavor but could be stronger!my dentist recommended this'no cavities last time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been purchasing these for my kids for over a year now, based on the recommendation of our Dentist. Great product, always arrive timely and in good condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars VERY OVERPRICED MOUTH WASH BUT DOES MOSTLY WHAT IT CLAIMS
reviews.reviewText: This alcohol-sugar sweetened Kool-aid tasting mouth rise is effective for minimizing periodontal disease related tooth decay and reduces enamel loss. CariFree does this with it's active fluoride, while minimizes dry mouth, and quickly neutralizes acidic saliva but that's mostly what it does. It is not anti-bacterial, anti-plaque, anti-halitosis, nor does it regenerate tooth enamel. The inexpensive chemical ingredients that make up this do not justify the 3 to 4 times higher price over commercial mouth rinses for a one month supply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved the taste and directions were easy to follow.
